name: Froggie Pogo
description:
Stop, drop, and bounce! Froggie Pogo is a small, arcade-inspired game about a frog on a pogo. Bounce on flies, rack up combos, and try to get as high of a score as possible 'til you can't bounce any more!

Features:

  • 4 playable Froggies, each with unique perks
  • A variety of power-ups to give you a boost
  • Unlockable accessories - dress up your Froggie the way you want
  • As you play through a round, things get a little... tighter
  • Very replayable - keep beating your records

Ready? Let's bounce!
